menu.item-veg-description: Shallow fried onion cooked in spicy flavourful tangy yogurt & cashew based gravy served with 2 paratahs + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A delicacy of Manglore. Chicken pieces cooked in ghee and warm spices served with 2 parathas + achar + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Mix of veggies cooked in freshly roasted kolapuri spices with onion & tomato based gravy served with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad
menu.item-nonveg-description: Soft chicken pieces cooked in freshly ground Manglorean spices. A warm and comforting meal served with rice + papad + achar + side salad

menu.item-veg-description: Grilled Indian cottage cheese cooked in warm flavourful onion & tomato based thick gravy served with 2 parathas + rice + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: A delicacy of Goa. A spicy, sour fish curry cooked in onion, tomato and tamrind based gravy served with rice + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Veggies stir fried in ghee topped with tangy tomato puree and topped with cream and served with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Tender minced lamb cooked in warm fragrant spices. Served with 2 parathas + side salad + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: A warm comforting dish from Kerala. Mix vegetable stew made with warm spices and coconut milk served with 2 appams (fermented rice pancakes) + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Chicken stew made in coconut milk with whole spices. A delicacy of Kerala served with 2 appams (fermented rice pancakes) + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Spicy, warm and flavourful potato and chickpea cooked with aromatic fragmented basmati rice served with yogurt dip + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Egg curry cooked in thick onion, cashew and coconut based gravy with flavourful spices served with 2 parathas + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: A traditional north Karnataka style eggplant curry in peanut based gravy with blend of freshly ground spices served with 2 parathas + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: Chicken cooked in spicy warm spinach gravy with fresh spices served with rice + papad + achar

menu.item-veg-description: Okra cooked in onion tomato based gravy with fresh spices and petals of onion served with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A classic dish from the state of Kerala. Slow cooked beef cooked in onion tomato based gravy served with soft Malabar parotta + achar

menu.item-veg-description: A classic comfort meal from the North of India. Spicy fritters dunked in flavourful comforting yogurt gravy served with rice + papad + achar
menu.item-nonveg-description: A one pot Maharashtrian style rice dish with prawns cooked in lip smacking fresh homemade Maharashtrian blend of spices served with yogurt dip + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Indian cottage cheese cooked in a onion cashew based thick gravy topped with fresh cream served with 2 parathas + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A Parsi dish in which red hot lamb is cooked to perfection with sizzling hot spices crowned with crispy golden potato shreds served with 2 paratha + mint chutney + papad

menu.item-veg-description: Black dal slow cooked with warm and comforting spices with spicy garnish of garlic, tomato and lots of butter served with 1 paratha + rice + achar + papad
menu.item-nonveg-description: A classic briyani dish from the northern part of kerala where spicy chicken pieces are cooked with crispy onion and tomatoes with aromatic basmati rice served with a yogurt dip + papad
